attributes.action: Review his decision not to remove VAT from vets bills
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the catastrophic state of the global economy it would help thousands of decent pet owners to keep their pets alive if the decision not to remove vat from vets bills is reversed. Although I am working I do not fall into the category that exempts me. That does not stop me from loving my pet. However, it does cause great hardship to many animal lovers to pay this unfair tax.
